summary: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 45382, entitled: "An ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries; regulating and limiting the use of buildings and premises and the height and size of buildings; providing for yards, courts, or other open spaces prescribing penalties and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith", approved June 28, 1932, and adding two new sections: Section 2 (XX) and Section 17 (XX).
